simple.escp.data

Class JsonDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.data.JsonDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource

    public class JsonDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSource
    This data source will read data source from JSON. The JSON can be in form of string or JsonObject.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonDataSource(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObject)
      Create a new JsonDataSource from a JsonObject.
      JsonDataSource(java.lang.String jsonString)
      Create a new JsonDataSource from string that consists of valid JSON format.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonDataSource

        public JsonDataSource(java.lang.String jsonString)
        Create a new JsonDataSource from string that consists of valid JSON format.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - a valid JSON string that will be parsed and used as source value for this data source.

      • JsonDataSource

        public JsonDataSource(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObject)
        Create a new JsonDataSource from a JsonObject.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - a JsonObject that will be used as source value for this data source.
